name: HTMLMediaElement.play
description: The HTMLMediaElement play() method attempts to begin playback of the media. It returns a Promise which is resolved when playback has been successfully started.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'play()' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.

refs.name: HTML5
refs.description: The definition of 'play()' in the 'HTML5' specification.
